Creating a web for your game in MIki.\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
Each web in MIki is a single propertycontainer located in a\\r\\nparticular folder. MIki references the various webs simply by tacking\\r\\nthe web name onto the specific folder, which is \\$(miki-web-folder)\. Thus, in order to create your own web, you need to either create a new empty propcontainer or duplicate an existing one.", "+\
Creating a web for your game in MIki.\ \
Each web in MIki is a single propertycontainer located in a particular folder. MIki references the various webs simply by tacking the web name onto the specific folder, which is \\$(miki-web-folder)\. Thus, in order to create your own web, you need to either create a new empty propcontainer or duplicate an existing one.", "-\\r\\nTo create a web called \\"\tictactoe\\\" you could do this:", "+ To create a web called \\"\tictactoe\\\" you could do this:", "-\\r\\n\\\r\\n\+cobj propcontainer \$(miki-web-folder)tictactoe\\\r\\n\
The [skotos.index_\|Skotos web] is currently the only web which is\\r\\nglobal across all games. But it is also readonly from all servers\\r\\nexcept Castle Marrach.", "+ \ \+cobj propcontainer \$(miki-web-folder)tictactoe\ \
The [skotos.index_\|Skotos web] is currently the only web which is global across all games. But it is also readonly from all servers except Castle Marrach.", "-\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
(unsupported) You can also \set a default web for your account\ to save you the trouble of going to your web after firing MIki up. ", "+ \ \

(unsupported) You can also \set a default web for your account\ to save you the trouble of going to your web after firing MIki up. (see [Bugs and issues in MIki] for more information)", "=1" \}), 1133999437, "zwoc" \})

"\
Creating a web for your game in MIki.\ \
Each web in MIki is a single propertycontainer located in a particular folder. MIki references the various webs simply by tacking the web name onto the specific folder, which is \\$(miki-web-folder)\. Thus, in order to create your own web, you need to either create a new empty propcontainer or duplicate an existing one.\ To create a web called \\"\tictactoe\\\" you could do this:\ \ \+cobj propcontainer \$(miki-web-folder)tictactoe\ \
The [skotos.index_\|Skotos web] is currently the only web which is global across all games. But it is also readonly from all servers except Castle Marrach.\ \ \
(unsupported) You can also \set a default web for your account\ to save you the trouble of going to your web after firing MIki up. (see [Bugs and issues in MIki] for more information)\ \ "
